item.title: CVE-2024-31093|2024-04-15T07:45:07.415Z -- kaloyan%20k.%20tsvetkov -- broken%20images
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Kaloyan K. Tsvetkov Broken Images allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Broken Images: from n/a through 0.2.
